title: Saving Forever
description: Ever and Cade,Sorry I vanished like I did. I'm not sure I can even explain things. I don't know when I'll be back. IF I'll be back. I'm not sure of anything, except that I love you, Ever. You're my twin, my best friend, and leaving you was the hardest thing I've ever done. I know you don't understand. Maybe you never will. I hope you don't, honestly. It would be easier that way. That's cowardly, I'm sure.Cade, take care of her. Love her, the way she deserves. The way you always have, for forever and always.If I could ask you anything, it's that you remember me as I was, and forget me as I am.I'm sorry, and goodbye, and I love you.Eden
author: Jasinda Wilder
